OpenMath Documentation
The OpenMath Standard
The OpenMath Standard describes the structure of OpenMath objects, encodings and content dictionaries. There are also a number of associated documents describing different kinds of type systems which can be used to augment the information in content dictionaries.
Useful Documents
On Writing OpenMath Content Dictionaries (PDF) A set of guidelines for prospective CD authors.
Conversion between MathML and OpenMath (PDF) A detailed description of the correspondance between symbols in content MathML and the MathML Cd Group.
